summary: Provides a suite of unit tests that validate DGL graph transformation utilities such as edge/node addition, self‑loop handling, graph reversal, line‑graph construction, k‑hop subgraph extraction, Laplacian computation, Metis partitioning, and feature normalization across heterogeneous and large graphs.
business_intent: Ensures that graph preprocessing operations used in graph neural network pipelines behave correctly and consistently, supporting reliable model training and inference.
